title: Salmon and sweet potato cakes
ingredients: ['2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 tablespoons crème fraîche', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '450g salmon fillet, cooked and flaked', '1 small red chilli, seeded and minced', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '2 to 4 tablespoons plain flour', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
